mlx.core.greater
****************

greater(a: scalar | array, b: scalar | array, stream: None | Stream | Device = None) -> array

   Element-wise greater than.

   Strict greater than on two arrays with numpy-style broadcasting
   semantics. Either or both input arrays can also be scalars.

   Parameters:
      * **a** (*array*) -- Input array or scalar.

      * **b** (*array*) -- Input array or scalar.

   Returns:
      The element-wise comparison "a > b".

   Return type:
      *array*
